sentence.Network_en: There is hardly a subject that you can mention that will not make him animadvert upon some aspect of human nature.
sentence.Network_cn: 你所能提出的问题,几乎没有不会使他在人性方面予以评论的.

sentence.Network_en: Try to avoid the too frequent use of such Latin words as juxtaposition, animadvert, salutation, recapitulate.
sentence.Network_cn: 尽量不要经常使用这些拉丁词语,比如juxtaposition, animadvert, salutation, recapitulate.

sentence.Network_en: Historical science's thinking is practice - animadvert's thinking and metaphysics is abstract thinking.
sentence.Network_cn: 历史科学思维是实践批判思维,形而上学是抽象思辨思维.

PerfectNetExp.abs: GRE 同义词总结大全 ... rap v 严厉指责 animadvert v 苛责，非难 culpability n 可责,有罪性,有过失.
...批评(critic)是以质疑、否定、批判为核心主体，其中批判(animadvert)是最为极端，其主体是抨击性谴责.
magn-(大的)＋animity(心)animadvert：批评,责备anima(心)＋vert(转动,扭转)
magn-(大的)＋animity(心)animadvert：批评,责备anima(心)＋vert(转动,扭转)

list.abs: animadverting on the rationalism and upholding the rational thinking ;, 批判理性主义而崇尚非理性思想;
historical science's thinking is practice - animadvert's thinking and metaphysics is abstract thinking .历史科学思维是实践批判思维,形而上学是抽象思辨思维.
as an intellectual , paying attention to animadvert on the arms is as important as acting as the arm of animadverting .而知识分子本身，则不但需要充当批判的武器，也需要注重武器的批判。
animadverting thought is a way of thinking which is necessary for legal profession.It is also an important part of legal professional ability .摘要批判性思维是法律职业所必需的思维方式，是法律职业能力结构中的重要组成部分；
proper methods should be sought to bring the animadverting thought training into the teaching system of legal profession education .应当把批评性思维训练纳入到法律职业教育教学体系之中，并且探索适当的途径和方法。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English  (in the sense 'pay attention to'): from Latin animadvertere, from animus 'mind' + advertere (from ad- 'towards' + vertere 'to turn')

means.word_mean: 1. speak one's opinion without fear or hesitation;
2. express blame or censure or make a harshly critical remark

stems_affixes.word_buile: in无+anim生命,精神+ate……的→adj.无生命的
long长+anim生命+ous……的→生命耐久→忍耐的
magn大+anim生命+ous……的→大生命→心胸博大
un=uni一个+anim生命+ous……的→[大家]同一个生命→一致的
anim生命,精神+al物→有生命的东西→动物
animate[v.使有生气,活泼]+ion动作或状态→animation生动;动画
anim生命,精神+osity多……的状态→生命太多→由爱变恨→仇恨
equ平等+anim生命+ity表名词→生命平等→平静

sentences.en: There is hardly a subject that you can mention that will not make him animadvert upon some aspect of human nature.
sentences.cn: 你所能提出的问题，几乎没有不会使他在人性方面予以评论的。
